revision.text: {{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=HA1000 |asin=B00OCXF4F2 |price=99.99 |est_release_date=December 2013 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |type=smart home hub |fcc_id=Q87-HA1000 |ic_id=3839A-HA1000 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6192 |cpu1_cspeed=800 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=29F2G08ABAFA |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Micron |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_module_if=SDIO |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8782 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E3019 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=1MHz, 4.5A Peak Current-Limit Step-Down Regulator;Marvell;88PG37E;;1;,,, Ultra low power RF Transceiver;Texas Instruments;CC110L;;1;,,, 8-bit microcontroller with onboard RAM;FreeScale Semiconductor;MCQE128C;;1;,,, 64K-bit serial EEPROM;Giantec Semiconductor;GT25C64;;1;,,, Z-Wave SoC;Sigma Designs;SD3502A;;1;,,, 128K-bit serial EEPROM;Giantec Semiconductor;GT25C128A;;1; |flags=RTC w/ battery backup, Z-Wave, |802dot11_protocols=bgn |oui_eth=A8:77:6F }}
